metadata.title: SecurityCopilot-Sentinel-Incident-Investigation
metadata.description: Logic App automating incident investigation within Microsoft Sentinel using Security Copilot
Leave 'true' if you want Security Copilot to investigate the IP addresses on AbuseIPDB. Set 'false' otherwise.
Leave 'true' if you want Security Copilot to investigate the IP addresses on MDTI. Set 'false' otherwise.
Leave 'true' if you want Security Copilot to investigate the accounts on MS Entra. Set 'false' otherwise.
Leave 'true' if you want Security Copilot to investigate the devices on Intune. Set 'false' otherwise.
Leave 'true' if you want Security Copilot to investigate the command lines by using its script analysis capability. Set 'false' otherwise.
Leave 'true' if you want Security Copilot to investigate the file hashes on MDTI. Set 'false' otherwise.
Leave 'true' if you want Security Copilot to investigate the Urls on MDTI. Set 'false' otherwise.
Leave 'true' if you want Security Copilot to investigate the domains on MDTI. Set 'false' otherwise.
Enter, as an array of strings, the IPs that you do not want Security Copilot to investigate
Enter, as an array of strings, the accounts that you do not want Security Copilot to investigate
Enter, as an array of strings, the devices that you do not want Security Copilot to investigate
Enter, as an array of strings, the command lines that you do not want Security Copilot to investigate
Enter, as an array of strings, the file hashes that you do not want Security Copilot to investigate
Enter, as an array of strings, the urls that you do not want Security Copilot to investigate
Enter, as an array of strings, the domains that you do not want Security Copilot to investigate

body.PromptContent: I'm curious about any abuseipdb records for the IP address @{items('For_Each_Entity')?['properties']?['address']}. Can you look that up for me for the last 30 days?

Give me all usr details for @{items('For_Each_Entity')?['properties']?['accountName']}. Does @{items('For_Each_Entity')?['properties']?['accountName']}have any registered devices in Microsoft Entra? List the recent risky sign-ins for @{items('For_Each_Entity')?['properties']?['accountName']}. Get Microsoft Entra audit logs for @{items('For_Each_Entity')?['properties']?['accountName']} for the past 72 hours.

Tell me more about the follwing process command lines: @{join(variables('UniqueCommandLines'),'
')}
By looking at MDTI, tell me the reputation of these indicators: @{variables('CsvIndicatorsForMDTI')}

Here is the security incident detail: @{outputs('Compose_-_Normalized_Incident_Data')}

Perform investigation on security incident in following order. Incident Overview, Incident Description, Analysis on Ip Address, Account, Host and Process, Possible mitigation steps and Conclusion.

Compose_-_Incident_Data.inputs:
Incident Ttile: @{triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['title']},
Incident Description: @{triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['description']},
Incident Severity: @{triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['severity']},
Incident Tactics: @{triggerBody()?['object']?['properties']?['additionalData']?['tactics']},
Ip Address Analysis: @{if(parameters('CallScpForIPsWithAbuseIPDB'),outputs('Compose_AbuseDBIP_Analysis'),'skipped...')},
Account Analysis: @{if(parameters('CallScpForAccounts'),outputs('Compose_Account_Analysis'),'skipped...')},
Device Analysis: @{if(parameters('CallScpForHosts'),outputs('Compose_Device_Analysis'),'skipped...')},
Process Analysis: @{if(parameters('CallScpForCommandLines'),outputs('Compose_Process_Analysis'),'skipped...')}
Evidences from MDTI: @{if(or(parameters('CallScpForIPsWithMDTI'),parameters('CallScpForFilehashesWithMDTI'),parameters('CallScpForUrlsWithMDTI'),parameters('CallScpForDomainsWithMDTI')),join(variables('ResponsesFromMDTI'),' ____ '),'skipped...')}
